tvshowdetails.label: Hemlock Grove
tvshowdetails.plot: The show examines the strange happenings in Hemlock Grove, a fictional town in Pennsylvania. Roman Godfrey, heir to the town's wealthy Godfrey family, befriends the town's newcomer, Peter Rumancek. Recent brutal murders in the town have stirred up rumors, and the two work together to shed light on the case while also hiding their own dark secrets.
tvshowdetails.title: Hemlock Grove

1.label: 1x01. Jellyfish in the Sky
1.plot: A teenager is murdered in the woods of Hemlock Grove. Evidence points to an animal attack but suspicions soon fall on Peter, the newly arrived gypsy.
1.title: Jellyfish in the Sky

1.label: 1x02. The Angel
1.plot: Roman confronts Peter at the crime scene, finding common ground. Letha reveals a shocking secret and Olivia and Norman fall into old habits.
1.title: The Angel

1.label: 1x03. The Order of the Dragon
1.plot: Christina discovers a new victim and Sheriff Sworn gets outside help from Dr. Chasseur. Now a suspect, Peter joins Roman to find the killer.
1.title: The Order of the Dragon

1.label: 1x04. In Poor Taste
1.plot: Letha's interest in Peter takes a turn. Chasseur and Sworn's investigation hits a new low while Roman and Peter stay one step ahead.
1.title: In Poor Taste

1.label: 1x05. Hello, Handsome
1.plot: Shelley's connection to Dr. Pryce is further revealed, Destiny helps Peter understand the recent murder and the gala at the Tower goes horribly awry.
1.title: Hello, Handsome

1.label: 1x06. The Crucible
1.plot: Peter and Roman follow Lisa Willoughby's trail to the old steel mill where they find a missing piece of the puzzle. Christina's date goes poorly.
1.title: The Crucible

1.label: 1x07. Measure of Disorder
1.plot: Shelley commits an act of independence, Chasseur questions Roman but crosses paths with Olivia, and Peter and Roman's friendship takes a turn.
1.title: Measure of Disorder

1.label: 1x08. Catabasis
1.plot: After drunkenly attacking the Godfrey Institute, Roman falls into a coma and embarks on a subconscious journey of shocking truths and revelations.
1.title: Catabasis

1.label: 1x09. What Peter Can Live Without
1.plot: As a full moon approaches, Letha's parents discover her relationship with Peter. Despite a crisis of faith, Chasseur prepares to capture the killer.
1.title: What Peter Can Live Without

1.label: 1x10. What God Wants
1.plot: A weakened Roman emerges from his coma and reunites with Peter to stop the killer. Hemlock Grove braces itself for another lethal full moon.
1.title: What God Wants

1.label: 1x11. The Price
1.plot: Peter and his mother hide from vigilantes seeking the killer, while Christina disappears, and Roman finally begins to face the truth about his nature.
1.title: The Price

1.label: 1x12. Children of the Night
1.plot: As Olivia and Chasseur face off at the Mill, Shelley learns the awful truth about her family, and Peter and Roman uncover the killer's identity.
1.title: Children of the Night

1.label: 1x13. Birth
1.plot: The tragic conclusion to the Hemlock Grove killing spree leaves both the Godfrey and Rumancek families devastated, with the final horror yet to come.
1.title: Birth
